name: The Death of the Virgin
description: The Death of the Virgin; Master of the Lübeck Bible (Flemish, about 1485-about 1520); Bruges, Belgium; about 1510 - 1520; Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 23.2 x 16.7 cm (9 1/8 x 6 9/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 18, fol. 247v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Death of the Virgin
medium: Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment
